title: Hunter Valley Five-Star Tuscan-Inspired Escape with Gourmet Wine & Cheese Tastings
description:
Find the true meaning of tranquility in the vibrant rolling hills of the Hunter Valley at Château Élan at The Vintage Hunter Valley. Set in the heart of Australia’s premium wine country, this European-inspired five-star retreat brings a little piece of Tuscany to New South Wales, with laidback country elegance and high-end gastronomy. Rooms are designed to take full advantage of the location, with floor-to-ceiling windows, private terraces and balconies offering an elevated position overlooking the verdant greenery of the rolling hills and The Vintage golf course.

Relish the delights of seasonal local produce and views over the golf course at Legends Grill or dine alfresco at Spike Bar. Practise your swing at the hotel’s award-winning 18-hole golf course designed by Greg Norman or watch the world go by at the 25-metre lap pool. If you’d rather unwind, the peaceful Hunter Valley Day Spa will help with relaxation, rejuvenation and recuperation. While leaving the hotel is optional, there’s more to see further afield - from wine and cheese tastings to early-morning hot-air balloon rides and exploring many walking or cycling trails.
offer_address: Vintage Drive, Pokolbin, New South Wales 2320, Australia

title: European Elegance in the Hunter Valley with Wine & Cheese Tasting
description:
Château Élan brings a little piece of Europe to the Hunter Valley with laidback country elegance and high-end gastronomy. Indulge the senses with daily plated breakfast, complimentary wine and cheese tasting at McLeish Estate Wines, a wine and cheese appreciation course at Hunter Valley Cheese (with purchases at exclusive members-only prices), a spirit tasting at Hunter Distillery, a complimentary Pukara Estate wine tasting, a welcome cocktail each, two A$25 spa credits to put towards individual treatments and 25% off green fees at The Vintage Golf Club.

**Travelling with family?** Check out the One-Bedroom Villa Apartment upgrade - two kids aged 12 and under stay free (see Fine Print for details).
offer_address: Vintage Drive, Pokolbin, New South Wales 2320, Australia

vendor_name: Grand Mercure The Vintage (Accor Vacation Club Account)

location_description: Grand Mercure The Vintage Accor Vacation Club Apartments
offer_address: Vintage Dr, Rothbury NSW 2320

title: Award-Winning, Five-Star Indulgence in the Scenic Hunter Valley Region
description: Indulge in a year-round romantic escape in the world-famous Hunter Valley food and wine region at the multi-award-winning Chateau Elan. Discover the laid-back country lifestyle, high-end gastronomy and some of the country’s finest wines with a two or three-night stay with daily buffet breakfast, an entrée each to enjoy at Legends Grill, welcome cocktail, guaranteed late 12pm checkout, spa credits and golfing discounts.
offer_address: Vintage Dr, Rothbury NSW 2320

vendor_name: voco Kirkton Park Hunter Valley , an IHG Hotel
title: Elegant Hunter Valley Wine Country Estate with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails & Local Wine Tastings
description:
Make this elegant Hunter Valley estate your base to explore Pokolbin's renowned cellar doors, artisan food makers, and craft distillers, all at your fingertips. Set among 70 acres of beautifully manicured gardens, with the rolling Broken Back Ranges as your backdrop, you’re perfectly placed to explore New South Wales' most cherished wine country.

Watch sunlight filter through the French windows of The Conservatory during breakfast, all while looking out over the rose garden and mountains. Indulge in paddock-to-plate cuisine from the hotel's own gardens at Locavore Dining and curl up by the fire with a glass of regional wine at Epoche Lounge Bar.

Pokolbin has the highest concentration of wineries in the valley and most are under a 10-minute drive from voco™ Kirkton Park Hunter Valley, an IHG Hotel. Visit Tyrell's Wines, home to some of the world's oldest grape vines, pop up the street to Tulloch Wines' award-winning cellar door and return to your hotel for a swim in the indoor heated pool.
location_description: voco Kirkton Park Hunter Valley by IHG
offer_address: 336 Oakey Creek Road, Pokolbin, New South Wales 2320, Australia

title: Hunter Valley Tuscan-Inspired Spa Escape with Daily Breakfast, Cellar Door Tasting & Cheese Appreciation Course
description:
Find the true meaning of tranquillity with a stay at Château Élan at The Vintage, a European-inspired retreat set in the picturesque rolling hills of the Hunter Valley, New South Wales' premier wine region. This estate is a little piece of Tuscany, with rooms designed to take full advantage of the verdant greenery of the valley and The Vintage Golf Course. Situated on an idyllic 100 acres, this property is a romantic rendezvous within two hours of Sydney, or just a one-hour drive from Newcastle Airport.

Surrounded by vineyards and meandering cellar door wine trails, and home to an elegant restaurant overlooking the fairways, Château Élan at The Vintage is ideal for those seeking luxurious gourmet experiences. Relish the delights of seasonal local produce at Legends Restaurant or dine alfresco at Spike Bar. Practise your swing at the hotel’s award-winning 18-hole golf course designed by Greg Norman, or watch the world go by at the 25-metre lap pool. If you’d rather unwind, the offerings at Château Élan Day Spa are sure to help with relaxation, rejuvenation and recuperation.
offer_address: Vintage Drive, Pokolbin, New South Wales 2320, Australia

title: Five-Star Gourmet Hunter Valley Escape

title: Tranquil Hunter Valley Wine Country Escape with Daily Breakfast & VIP Wine-Tasting Experience
description:
Go to where the wine flows, vines are rich and full, and lush hills endlessly roll. Perched among a myriad of cellar doors, Rydges Resort Hunter Valley offers the perfect countryside hideaway, just a few hours from Sydney. The region’s largest resort offers a tremendous number of things to see, sip and savour - settle into a pint at Sydney Brewery Hunter Valley, take a swing at Hunter Valley Golf Club or indulge among the vines at Ubika Spa. It’s also the place to sink your teeth into the Hunter Valley’s legendary farm-to-fork dining scene, with Redsalt Restaurant plating a five-course degustation ‘Behind the Vines’ experience - the perfect way to sample the region's best.

When you’re ready to explore, Hunter Valley’s wine country has countless delights in store. Your package includes a VIP tasting experience for two at the offsite First Creek Wines, covering tipples from the winery’s award-winning Classic, Limited and Reserve Ranges. Alternative adventures include the Hunter Valley Gardens, Maitland Regional Art Gallery and one of the country’s most impressive arrays of local wineries and distilleries.
offer_address: 430 Wine Country Drive, Lovedale, New South Wales 2325, Australia

title: Hunter Valley Newly Renovated Leading Wellness Retreat with Exclusive All-Inclusive Packages & Retreat Credit
description:
Find your happy place at the newly renovated Elysia Wellness Retreat, one of Australia’s leading wellness sanctuaries in the heart of the Hunter Valley acclaimed wine country. Take a moment for yourself, far from the distractions of the every day, and become completely immersed in nature -  and among the vines - at this wellness sanctuary. 

Be among the first to experience the retreat's newly refurbished Premium One-Bedroom Villas, completed in December 2021. Stretch out, relax and take a deep breath with daily yoga classes, soothe your soul with guided tai chi lessons at sunrise, and take advantage of the pristine Hunter Valley vistas on this all-inclusive escape curated exclusively for Luxury Escapes’ customers. Nestled in the picturesque Hunter Valley - Australia’s oldest wine-making region - Elysia Wellness Retreat is a welcome escape from reality. Experience laidback, all-inclusive luxury staying at Tripadvisor’s #1 hotel in Pokolbin, where you can relax, recharge and reset with a dip in the indoor and outdoor swimming pool, enjoy an afternoon round of tennis, or cosy up by the fire. Surrounded by panoramic views of wine country, this retreat focuses on yoga, rest and wholesome meals to soothe your soul.
offer_address: 165 Thompsons Road, Pokolbin, New South Wales 2320, Australia

title: Serene Hunter Valley Wellness Retreat with Top-Rated Spa & Retreat Credit + All-Inclusive Dining Upgrades Available
description:

title: Elegant Hunter Valley Villa Retreat with Premier Upgrade & Complimentary Wine Tasting
description:
Leave city life behind and discover the vibrant rolling hills and boundless serenity of the Hunter Valley with a villa escape at Oaks Cypress Lakes Resort, perfectly set in the heart of historic Pokolbin, one of Australia's most cherished wine countries. This self-contained apartment-style oasis is an idyllic hideaway featuring laidback country elegance, high-end gastronomy and no shortage of championship golf. Villas are designed to take full advantage of the location, with private balconies offering an elevated position overlooking boundless rambling hinterland.

Relish the delights of seasonal plates and golf course views at Cypress Lakes Bistro & Bar, or indulge in a culinary journey inspired by Pokolbin's soaring history at Oak & Vine. Practise your swing at the picturesque 18-hole golf course - the annual host of The Players Series Hunter Valley championship - or enjoy a soak in the resort's steaming jacuzzi. Journey further afield to discover the Hunter Valley's rich tapestry of bespoke experiences, from wine and cheese tastings to early-morning hot air balloon rides and superb bushwalking trails.
offer_address: 15 Thompsons Road, Pokolbin, Hunter Valley, New South Wales 2320, Australia

title: All-Inclusive Golden Door Health and Wellness Retreat with Daily Wellbeing Activities
description: Whether you’re settling back on the balcony and watching the kangaroos feed at dusk, enjoying the indoor or outdoor pool or relaxing in your luxurious villa, the exclusive, hilltop Golden Door Elysia Health Retreat & Spa is a welcome sanctuary from reality. Recently voted ‘Australia’s Best Wellness Retreat 2018’ in the World Spa Awards, Golden Door invites you to stay in a one-bedroom villa and enjoy all-inclusive, daily gourmet meals (breakfast, lunch, dinner, morning tea and afternoon tea) designed to nourish and detox the body, daily fitness and wellbeing activities, daily seminar, access to the on-site, high-end facilities, a retreat credit and a complimentary guest speaker session on Saturday evening.
location_description: Golden Door Elysia Health Retreat and Spa - Nov 2018
offer_address: 165 Thompsons Rd, Pokolbin NSW 2320

title: Tuscan-Inspired Hunter Valley Luxury Cottage for Eight Guests with Dining Credit & Wine Tasting
description:
Join your friends and family on an indulgent escape in the vibrant rolling hills of the Hunter Valley at Wandin Valley Estate's exclusive Oliver's Cottage - a beautifully designed four-bedroom, four-bathroom abode for up to eight guests. Blessed with a spectacular location in the Lovedale area of the Lower Hunter Valley, Wandin Valley Estate brings a little piece of Tuscany to New South Wales, with laidback country elegance and decadent gastronomy.

Ideal for groups, this self-contained cottage is perfectly positioned amid the estate's glorious private bushland. Make yourself at home among four ensuite bedrooms - each with private balconies and individual keypad access - a large open-plan living area and private sheltered alfresco space offering unrivalled views over the verdant greenery of Australia’s premium wine country. Unwind by the open fire, cook up feasts in your private kitchen or on the BBQ, or wander over to Wandin Valley Estate's cellar door and restaurant, where Head Chef John Rutherford and his team are happy to do all the hard work for you.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Enjoy A$50 drinks and dining credit per couple for use at the onsite restaurant or cellar door
- Savour a one-time afternoon premium wine tasting experience for your group
- Toast your escape with two complimentary bottles of 2019 Wandin Estate Rosé
- Delight in a delicious cheese platter with a selection of cheeses, quince, Wandin honey and crisps
offer_address: 12 Wilderness Rd, Lovedale NSW 2320, Australia

title: Tuscan-Inspired Hunter Valley Vineyard Hideaway with Self-Contained Cottages, Breakfast Hamper & Premium Wine Tasting
description:
Leave it all behind for the vibrant rolling hills of the Hunter Valley at this beautifully designed retreat, boasting an intimate collection of self-contained cottages and villas. Perfect for a romantic escape or group get-together, Wandin Valley Estate takes full advantage of its location, with beautifully designed open-plan living and unrivalled views over the verdant greenery of New South Wales' premium wine country. When you're not busy sampling exquisite drops at the surrounding vineyards or onsite cellar door, take a dip in the estate's tranquil swimming pool, featuring a stunning landscaped backdrop. Retreat to your abode and cook up a feast in your private kitchen, or wander over to Wandin Kitchen restaurant where a locally sourced menu features ingredients picked straight from the onsite garden.

While in the Hunter Valley, take a drive and explore the region's offerings, which not only include hundreds of bespoke wineries, but also a wealth of opportunities to get out in nature. Explore the romantic Hunter Valley Gardens, Wildlife Park and hot air ballooning, all just a short drive away.

title: Tuscan-Inspired Hunter Valley Group Villa for Eight Guests with Dining Credit & Wine Tasting
description:
Get together with friends or family and escape to the vibrant rolling hills of the Hunter Valley at Wandin Valley Estate's Villa Zara - an ultra-luxe four-bedroom, four-bathroom villa for eight guests. Blessed with a spectacular location in the Lovedale area of the Lower Hunter Valley, Wandin Valley Estate brings a little piece of Tuscany to New South Wales, with laidback country elegance and decadent gastronomy.

Perfect for families or groups, this self-contained villa takes full advantage of its location, with a large open-plan living area and private gardens nestled into the mountain slope, overlooking the verdant greenery of Australia’s premium wine country. Winter calls for cosy nights by the large open log fire, while the private outdoor BBQ is perfect for a summer feast with friends. Don't feel like cooking? Wander over to Wandin Valley Estate's cellar door and restaurant, where Head Chef John Rutherford and his team are happy to do all the hard work for you.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Enjoy A$50 drinks and dining credit per couple for use at the onsite restaurant or cellar door
- Savour a one-time afternoon premium wine tasting experience for your group
- Toast your escape with two complimentary bottles of 2019 Wandin Estate Rosé
- Delight in a delicious cheese platter with a selection of cheeses, quince, Wandin honey and crisps

**Travelling with a larger group?** This villa can accommodate up to 12 guests: two additional guests may stay free of charge and a further two may stay for a surcharge (see package for details). Please note, extra guests will not receive inclusions.

title: Elegant Hunter Valley Lakeside Villa Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Wine Tasting
description:
Leave city life behind and discover the rolling hills and boundless serenity of the Hunter Valley at Oaks Cypress Lakes Resort. Perfectly set in historic Pokolbin, one of Australia's most cherished wine countries, this self-contained apartment-style oasis is an idyllic hideaway.

Villas are designed to take full advantage of the location, with private balconies offering an elevated position overlooking boundless rambling hinterland. title: Boutique Vineyard Escape in the Heart of the Hunter Valley with Local Wine, Daily Breakfast & One Italian Lunch
description:
Framed by the verdant vineyards of Pokolbin, The Convent Hunter Valley delivers a luxurious stay and gourmet greatness in one of Australia's premier wine regions. Here, European elegance meets Hamptons-inspired decor in the stunning surroundings of the New South Wales countryside. Flock to this romantic retreat and be lured in by fine wines, sprawling vineyard vistas and timeless charm. Start the morning with a refined breakfast at Restaurant Eighty Eight before entertaining yourself with a relaxed game of boules or an energetic bout of tennis. As evening falls, take in sunset views at Pepper Tree Wines, located right next door, before sampling award-winning vintages, or dine on farm-to-fork organic fare at The Convent's Circa 1876 restaurant. 

Located 2.5 hours outside Sydney, The Convent Hunter Valley puts you in prime position to experience all the best the region has to offer, with gardens and vineyards surrounding the property. Aside from sipping wines, fill your days sampling fresh produce at Hunter Valley Cheese Factory, Binnorie Dairy, and the Hunter Olive Centre - all within a delightful drive of the property. Or, embrace nature as you explore the region, hiking to Bimbadeen Lookout and Mount Bright Lookout for the best views, or venturing a little further out to explore by horseback at Chapman Valley Horse Riding.
offer_address: 88 Halls Road, Pokolbin 2320, New South Wales, Australia

title: Tuscan-Inspired Hunter Valley Vineyard Luxury with Dining Credit & Wine Tasting
description:
Leave it all behind for the vibrant rolling hills of the Hunter Valley at Wandin Valley Estate - a beautifully designed retreat boasting an intimate collection of self-contained accommodation for couples and small groups. Blessed with a spectacular location in the Lovedale area of the Lower Hunter Valley, Wandin Valley Estate brings a little piece of Tuscany to New South Wales, with laidback country elegance and decadent gastronomy.

Perfect for a romantic escape or group gettogether, each self-contained studio and villa takes full advantage of its location, with beautifully designed open-plan living and unrivalled views over the verdant greenery of New South Wales' premium wine country. When you're not busy sampling exquisite drops at the surrounding vineyards or onsite cellar door, take a dip in the estate's tranquil swimming pool, featuring a stunning landscaped backdrop. Retreat to your abode and cook up a feast in your private kitchen, or wander over to Wandin Valley Estate's cellar door and restaurant, where Head Chef John Rutherford and his team are happy to do all the hard work for you.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Enjoy A$50 dining credit per couple for use at the onsite restaurant
- Savour a one-time afternoon premium wine tasting experience
- Toast your escape with a complimentary bottle of 2019 Wandin Estate Rosé per couple
- Delight in a delicious one-time cheese platter to share with a selection of cheeses, quince, Wandin honey and crisps

**Travelling with a group?** Choose Alasdair's Place, Villa Angus or Villa Isabella for up to four guests. 

**Upgrade bonus:** receive a second bottle of Wandin Estate wine and double the dining credit per package (A$50 per couple) for the onsite restaurant

title: Serene Hunter Valley Wellness Retreat with Top-Rated Spa & Retreat Credit + All-Inclusive Dining Upgrades Available
description:
Experience laidback luxury at one of Australia’s leading wellness sanctuaries in the heart of the Hunter Valley's acclaimed wine country. Take a moment for yourself, far from the distractions of daily life, and become completely immersed in nature - and among the vines. Stretch out, relax and take a deep breath with daily wellness classes, soothe your soul with guided tai chi lessons at sunrise and take advantage of pristine Hunter Valley vistas. Whether you are seeking a self-guided adventure or a wellness retreat tailored for one or two guests Elysia Wellness Retreat has unique wellness experiences suited to your needs.

Surrounded by lush greenery in Australia’s oldest wine-making region, Elysia Wellness Retreat is a welcome escape from reality. You'd be forgiven for thinking you were in Italy, with rolling hills and olive groves sprawling out as far as the eye can see, along with cultural sites and World Heritage-listed parks to explore should you choose to venture out from your slice of paradise.

title: Hunter Valley Tuscan-Inspired Vineyard Escape with Chef-Hatted Restaurant
description:
Enjoy a taste of Italy in the heart of the Hunter Valley at Estate Tuscany, nestled into the rolling green hills of Pokolbin. Surrounded by olive groves and 26 acres of beautiful countryside, this boutique retreat whisks you away from everyday life and into a Tuscan-inspired dream. Take a leisurely stroll from your room to The Mill restaurant, where Executive Chef William Townsend whips up chef-hatted fare to a backdrop of picturesque mountain views. Brokenback Bar is the perfect spot for a post-dinner glass of local wine, before retiring to your room and keeping an eye out for local wildlife grazing by your front door.

Spend lazy days amid the hotel gardens, taking a dip in the outdoor pool or enjoying a tasting at Thomas Wines cellar door. Beyond the estate, the wider delights of the Hunter Valley beckon, from wine tours to nearby Tomaree National Park and Stockton Beach. This is your chance to switch off and make your Italian-inspired daydreams come alive without even leaving the country.

**Your handpicked inclusions**

- Head to The Breakfast Room each morning for a Continental or Tuscan breakfast
- Try chef-hatted dining at The Mill with A$30 food credit per room, per stay
- Arrive to welcome canapés at Brokenback Bar
- Enjoy a leisurely morning with 11am checkout
- Make the most of local discounts, including 30% off a mini vineyard bus tour
- Stay connected with free Wi-Fi

**Vineyard-View Upgrade**: Wake to views over the surrounding vineyards when you upgrade to the Vineyard-View Room - this is the ultimate in Hunter Valley romance.
offer_address: Mistletoe Ln &, Hermitage Rd, Pokolbin NSW 2320

vendor_name: voco Kirkton Park Hunter Valley , an IHG Hotel
title: Elegant Hunter Valley Estate with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails & Local Wine Tastings
description:
Make this elegant Hunter Valley estate your base to explore Pokolbin's renowned cellar doors, artisan food makers and craft distillers, all at your fingertips. Set among 70 acres of beautifully manicured gardens, with the rolling Brokenback Ranges as your backdrop, you’re perfectly placed to explore New South Wales' most cherished wine country.

Watch sunlight filter through the French windows of The Conservatory during breakfast, all while looking out over the rose garden and mountains. Indulge in paddock-to-plate cuisine from the hotel's own gardens at Locavore Dining and curl up by the fire with a glass of regional wine at Epoche Bar & Lounge. 

Pokolbin has the highest concentration of wineries in the valley and most are under a 10-minute drive from the hotel. Visit Tyrrell's Wines, home to some of the oldest grape vines in Australia, or pop up the street to McLeish Estate's award-winning cellar door before returning to the hotel for a swim in the indoor heated pool.
location_description: voco Kirkton Park Hunter Valley by IHG
offer_address: 336 Oakey Creek Road, Pokolbin, New South Wales 2320, Australia
